class.name: JLayersTable
class.description: The [JLayersTable] is a [Resource] in which the [JBody3D] collision-response types are stored. Generally you have a single table for the entire project, for example [code]res://jolt_layers_table.tres[/code]. In order to use this table, it's necessary to specify its path on the project settings [code]jolt/config/layers_table[/code] In order to add a new Layer or change a layer's collision response, you can double click the resource to open it and change its content using the detail panel.
